content: {"name": "Christ House", "alternate_name": "", "description": "NOTICE: We are sorry to report the phone lines at the Christ House food pantry are temporarily not working. If you know the individual you are trying to reach, please email them directly. If you do not know the name of the person, please email StLucyProject-CH@ccda.net or aniliza.juan@ccda.net.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ccda.net/need-help/food/food-pantries/alexandria-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "131 S West St", "address_2": null, "city": "Alexandria", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "22314", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8050927, "longitude": -77.05496324}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 549-8644", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
